# Index of Elixir llms.txt files
> Top-level index for Elixir llms.txt collections.

## Collections
* [Core Elixir Topics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/core/llms.txt): Index for core language features and best practices.
* [Elixir Libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/llms.txt): Index for common Elixir libraries like Phoenix.
